duties_responsibilities.duty: Development and maintenance of Informatica Mappings, Workflows, and processes for ETL in a data warehouse environment.
Programming against large data assets using SQL and integration technologies.
Experience with Airflow or other automated job scheduling tools.
Working on an Agile Development team and delivering features incrementally.
Experience with API/REST, JSON, and working with Git repositories.
Developing in Python and working with Pytest framework or other testing frameworks.
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure) and familiarity with a variety of program languages.
Working knowledge of setting up builds and deployments using Azure DevOps, JIRA, or similar project tracking software.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
